publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3489 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis—That the Parliament congratulates Larkhall man Scott Cunningham on his amazing fundraising efforts in aid of Guide Dogs; congratulates Scott on raising over £60,000 for Guide Dogs, which has so far helped to sponsor nine guide dog pups, and wishes him and his guide dog, Travis, every success in their forthcoming walk from north to south on the West Highland Way, making him the first blind man to cover the route and on which he will be accompanied by a number of former Rangers players. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Michael McMahon*, Elaine Murray*, Sandra White*, Trish Godman*, Jamie McGrigor*, David Stewart*, Bill Kidd* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-3489 Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis (lodged on 23 February 2009) Mary Mulligan*, Robin Harper*, John Park*, Sarah Boyack*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3489 Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis (lodged on 23 February 2009) Jim Hume*
S3M-3489 Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis (lodged on 23 February 2009) Jackie Baillie*

S3M-3489 Karen Gillon: Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis—That the Parliament congratulates Larkhall man Scott Cunningham on his amazing fundraising efforts in aid of Guide Dogs; congratulates Scott on raising over £60,000 for Guide Dogs, which has so far helped to sponsor nine guide dog pups, and wishes him and his guide dog, Travis, every success in their forthcoming walk from north to south on the West Highland Way, making him the first blind man to cover the route and on which he will be accompanied by a number of former Rangers players. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Michael McMahon, Elaine Murray, Sandra White, Trish Godman, Jamie McGrigor, David Stewart, Bill Kidd, Mary Mulligan, Robin Harper, John Park, Sarah Boyack, Hugh O’Donnell, Nanette Milne, Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Jim Hume, Jackie Baillie
S3M-3489 Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis (lodged on 23 February 2009) Margaret Curran*
S3M-3489 Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis (lodged on 23 February 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-3489 Congratulations to Scott Cunningham and Travis (lodged on 23 February 2009) Angela Constance*
